Original:
#前言：露天酒吧, 沒有冷氣, 怕脫妝的不適合來, 不過, 只開夜間時段的這家，氛圍浪漫, 要約會的還是可以列入推薦。

#這排露天酒吧大約四家左右, 這家是沒有放戶外大音箱在撥音樂的, 比較適合有聊天需求的。與另三間的差異性, 這家的酒類是比較以日式為主的。

#餐點嚴格說來, 口感上只有到"OK", 但以配酒菜的標準去看, 又比一般外頭的路邊攤那類的顯得高級很多。
所以：整體CP值上, 個人覺得餐飲與訂價上的是有對到位的。

但是！若再加上“服務”這一點, 那就又變超值了。服務親切度與專業度都沒話說, 最厲害的是, 這日造訪, 前後經歷了三位服務, 三位都是如此。

是間我個人會再度再訪的露天酒吧。

#酒類選項：清酒、梅酒、(日式)威士忌(個人覺得好喝! 口感順暢不嗆、香氣溫和,很日本印象啊~)、調酒。食物類選項還蠻多, 就請大家自行至現場再參考菜單了。

可能是鄰近的忠孝東路算大條、還未有太多高聳建物，夏季夜晚來都有微風，完全不感戶外悶熱，很是舒服的露天酒吧。
與友人小酌聊天，再散步個一段路，甚是愜意。
EN:
#Foreword: The open -air bar, there is no air -conditioning, not suitable for getting off makeup, but only the atmosphere of the night, the atmosphere is romantic, you can still be included in the recommendation.

#This row of open -air bar is about four. This one is not outdoor outdoor speakers. It is more suitable for chat needs.Different from the other three rooms, this alcohol is relatively Japanese -style.

#Strictly speaking, the taste is only "OK", but looking at the standards of wine and vegetables, it looks much more advanced than the ordinary roadside stalls outside.
So: In terms of the overall CP value, I personally think that catering and pricing are in place.

but!If you add the "service" point, it will change again.The service intimacy and professionalism have nothing to say. The most powerful thing is that this day visits, and three services have been experienced before and after.

It is an open -air bar I personally visit again.

#Options: sake, plum wine, (Japanese style) whiskey (personally feel delicious! The taste is smooth, the aroma is gentle, very Japanese impression ~), bartender.There are quite a lot of food options, please refer to the menu on the scene.

It may be that the neighboring Zhongxiao East Road is a large bar, and there are not too many towering buildings. There are breeze in the summer night.
Chatting with friends and walking again for a while, it is very comfortable.

This place is outdoors, simple and not too fancy, so if you are looking for a place with a good atmosphere, it may not be the best choice.However, it is adjacent to the Taipei Popular Music Center, so it is convenient to drink a cup before concert or event.The price is also good.

Original: 我在音樂會前有一段時間，所以進去吃了點東西，因為這是附近唯一的餐廳。我問食物需要多長時間，他們說 15 分鐘（當時我大約 45 分鐘），所以我繼續點了檸檬華夫餅。 25 分鐘後，我的華夫餅根本沒有出現，距離音樂會開始只有大約 20 分鐘，所以我問我的食物是否很快就會送來。他們說再等5分鐘，但我連吃的時間都沒有了。他們剛剛把錢還給我了。就是這樣。我現在超級餓，希望在接下來的兩個小時的演唱會中我不會暈倒。
EN: I had some time before the concert, so I went in and ate something, because this was the only restaurant nearby.I asked how long the food would take, and they said 15 minutes (about 45 minutes at the time), so I continued to order Lemon Huafu cake.After 25 minutes, my Wahfu cake did not appear at all, and it was only about 20 minutes from the beginning of the concert, so I asked my food if it would be delivered soon.They said they waited for another 5 minutes, but I didn't even have time to eat.They just gave me the money.That's it.I am super hungry now, and I hope I won't faint in the next two -hour concert.
